title: Ship Items Efficiently
description: A step-by-step system to ship faster, cheaper, and with fewer returns or damage claims.

steps.title: Set up your shipping station
steps.description: Printer, labels, tape, scale, and packaging. Get everything in one place before you start.

steps.title: Pick, pack, and weigh consistently
steps.description: Weigh every item before printing a label. Avoid overpaying or underpaying for postage.

steps.title: Buy and attach labels correctly
steps.description: Label placement matters â€” scanners need clear sight of the barcode. Cover the old label if reusing a box.

steps.title: Track shipments and handle issues
steps.description: Know what to do when tracking stalls, packages get lost, or buyers claim non-delivery.

steps.title: Log shipping cost in Orben
steps.description: Record your actual shipping cost so profit calculations stay accurate.
